title: Galaxy Adventures
description:
Simulates a space tourism agency with a comprehensive booking system to plan your next trip to space destinations.

Built for the 2023 Webmasters Competition for the Technology Student Association. Won 2nd place in the state of Texas and 4th in the nation.

title: HealthGPT
description:
AI patient diagnosis system that uses GPT-3 to generate a diagnosis based on patient symptoms.

Won 5th in the 2023 Computer Science Youth of America Hackathon.

title: Planet Facts
description: Simple educational website that displays facts about the planets in our solar system.

title: The Health Education Project
description: Developed a website for a non-profit organization that provides free, reliable health education to the public.

title: PassPal
description: Password generator with customizable settings to generate a password that fits your needs.
